changeSet.author: slawomirbankowski

createTable.remarks: host on which executor can execute

column.name: guid
column.remarks: globally unique ID of single row

column.name: insertedRowDate
column.remarks: date and time of insertion given row to database

column.name: lastUpdatedDate
column.remarks: date and time of change this row

column.name: hostName
column.remarks: name of host like serv001

column.name: hostIp
column.remarks: IP of host in format x.x.x.x

column.name: hostDomain
column.remarks: domain name

column.name: hostOsType
column.remarks: host Operating System type: Windows, Linux Red Hat, ...

column.name: hostOsVersion
column.remarks: version number of Operating System

changeSet.createView: select algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationId, algorithmImplementation1.guid, algorithmImplementation1.insertedRowDate, algorithmImplementation1.lastUpdatedDate, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmTypeVersionId, algorithmImplementation1.executorTypeId, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationName, algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationClass , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionId , algorithmTypeVersion1.guid as algorithmTypeVersion_guid , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeId , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionName as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionName , algorithmTypeVersion1.insertedRowDate as algorithmTypeVersion_insertedRowDate , algorithmTypeVersion1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmTypeVersion_lastUpdatedDate , executorType1.executorTypeId as executorType_executorTypeId , executorType1.guid as executorType_guid , executorType1.insertedRowDate as executorType_insertedRowDate , executorType1.lastUpdatedDate as executorType_lastUpdatedDate , executorType1.executorTypeName as executorType_executorTypeName , executorType1.executorTypeClass as executorType_executorTypeClass from algorithmImplementation algorithmImplementation1 join algorithmTypeVersion algorithmTypeVersion1 on algorithmImplementation1.algorithmTypeVersionId = algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionId join executorType executorType1 on algorithmImplementation1.executorTypeId = executorType1.executorTypeId;

select algorithmParamType1.algorithmParamTypeId, algorithmParamType1.algorithmParamId, algorithmParamType1.algorithmTypeId, algorithmParamType1.algorithmTypeVersionId, algorithmParamType1.insertedRowDate, algorithmParamType1.lastUpdatedDate, algorithmParamType1.guid , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamId as algorithmParam_algorithmParamId , algorithmParam1.guid as algorithmParam_guid , algorithmParam1.insertedRowDate as algorithmParam_insertedRowDate , algorithmParam1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmParam_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamName as algorithmParam_algorithmParamName , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamDescription as algorithmParam_algorithmParamDescription , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamType as algorithmParam_algorithmParamType , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeId as algorithmType_algorithmTypeId , algorithmType1.guid as algorithmType_guid , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeName as algorithmType_algorithmTypeName , algorithmType1.algorithmTypeDescription as algorithmType_algorithmTypeDescription , algorithmType1.insertedRowDate as algorithmType_insertedRowDate , algorithmType1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmType_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionId , algorithmTypeVersion1.guid as algorithmTypeVersion_guid , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeId as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeId , algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionName as algorithmTypeVersion_algorithmTypeVersionName , algorithmTypeVersion1.insertedRowDate as algorithmTypeVersion_insertedRowDate , algorithmTypeVersion1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmTypeVersion_lastUpdatedDate from algorithmParamType algorithmParamType1 join algorithmParam algorithmParam1 on algorithmParamType1.algorithmParamId = algorithmParam1.algorithmParamId join algorithmType algorithmType1 on algorithmParamType1.algorithmTypeId = algorithmType1.algorithmTypeId join algorithmTypeVersion algorithmTypeVersion1 on algorithmParamType1.algorithmTypeVersionId = algorithmTypeVersion1.algorithmTypeVersionId;

select algorithmRun1.algorithmRunId, algorithmRun1.guid, algorithmRun1.algorithmScheduleId, algorithmRun1.executorInstanceId, algorithmRun1.executorStorageId, algorithmRun1.algorithmRunName, algorithmRun1.insertedRowDate, algorithmRun1.lastUpdatedDate, algorithmRun1.runDate, algorithmRun1.isRunning, algorithmRun1.isFinished , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleId , algorithmSchedule1.guid as algorithmSchedule_guid , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmImplementationId , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleTypeId , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleName as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleName , algorithmSchedule1.isScheduled as algorithmSchedule_isScheduled , algorithmSchedule1.insertedRowDate as algorithmSchedule_insertedRowDate , algorithmSchedule1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmSchedule_lastUpdatedDate , executorInstance1.executorInstanceId as executorInstance_executorInstanceId , executorInstance1.guid as executorInstance_guid , executorInstance1.executorTypeId as executorInstance_executorTypeId , executorInstance1.executorHostId as executorInstance_executorHostId , executorInstance1.executorInstanceName as executorInstance_executorInstanceName , executorInstance1.isRunning as executorInstance_isRunning , executorInstance1.isFinished as executorInstance_isFinished , executorInstance1.portNumber as executorInstance_portNumber , executorInstance1.insertedRowDate as executorInstance_insertedRowDate , executorInstance1.lastUpdatedDate as executorInstance_lastUpdatedDate , executorInstance1.endDate as executorInstance_endDate , executorStorage1.executorStorageId as executorStorage_executorStorageId , executorStorage1.guid as executorStorage_guid , executorStorage1.executorHostId as executorStorage_executorHostId , executorStorage1.executorStorageTypeId as executorStorage_executorStorageTypeId , executorStorage1.storageDefinition as executorStorage_storageDefinition , executorStorage1.storageBasePath as executorStorage_storageBasePath , executorStorage1.storageFulllPath as executorStorage_storageFulllPath , executorStorage1.isRunning as executorStorage_isRunning , executorStorage1.portNumber as executorStorage_portNumber , executorStorage1.insertedRowDate as executorStorage_insertedRowDate , executorStorage1.lastUpdatedDate as executorStorage_lastUpdatedDate from algorithmRun algorithmRun1 join algorithmSchedule algorithmSchedule1 on algorithmRun1.algorithmScheduleId = algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleId join executorInstance executorInstance1 on algorithmRun1.executorInstanceId = executorInstance1.executorInstanceId join executorStorage executorStorage1 on algorithmRun1.executorStorageId = executorStorage1.executorStorageId;

select algorithmRunView1.algorithmRunViewId, algorithmRunView1.guid, algorithmRunView1.algorithmRunId, algorithmRunView1.executorStorageViewId, algorithmRunView1.insertedRowDate, algorithmRunView1.lastUpdatedDate, algorithmRunView1.isDownloaded , algorithmRun1.algorithmRunId as algorithmRun_algorithmRunId , algorithmRun1.guid as algorithmRun_guid , algorithmRun1.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmRun_algorithmScheduleId , algorithmRun1.executorInstanceId as algorithmRun_executorInstanceId , algorithmRun1.executorStorageId as algorithmRun_executorStorageId , algorithmRun1.algorithmRunName as algorithmRun_algorithmRunName , algorithmRun1.insertedRowDate as algorithmRun_insertedRowDate , algorithmRun1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmRun_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmRun1.runDate as algorithmRun_runDate , algorithmRun1.isRunning as algorithmRun_isRunning , algorithmRun1.isFinished as algorithmRun_isFinished , executorStorageView1.executorStorageViewId as executorStorageView_executorStorageViewId , executorStorageView1.guid as executorStorageView_guid , executorStorageView1.insertedRowDate as executorStorageView_insertedRowDate , executorStorageView1.lastUpdatedDate as executorStorageView_lastUpdatedDate , executorStorageView1.executorStorageSnapshotId as executorStorageView_executorStorageSnapshotId , executorStorageView1.executorStorageId as executorStorageView_executorStorageId , executorStorageView1.sourceDownloadId as executorStorageView_sourceDownloadId , executorStorageView1.storagePath as executorStorageView_storagePath , executorStorageView1.viewSize as executorStorageView_viewSize , executorStorageView1.viewRowsCount as executorStorageView_viewRowsCount from algorithmRunView algorithmRunView1 join algorithmRun algorithmRun1 on algorithmRunView1.algorithmRunId = algorithmRun1.algorithmRunId join executorStorageView executorStorageView1 on algorithmRunView1.executorStorageViewId = executorStorageView1.executorStorageViewId;

select algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleId, algorithmSchedule1.guid, algorithmSchedule1.algorithmImplementationId, algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleTypeId, algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleName, algorithmSchedule1.isScheduled, algorithmSchedule1.insertedRowDate, algorithmSchedule1.lastUpdatedDate , algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmImplementation_algorithmImplementationId , algorithmImplementation1.guid as algorithmImplementation_guid , algorithmImplementation1.insertedRowDate as algorithmImplementation_insertedRowDate , algorithmImplementation1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmImplementation_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmImplementation1.algorithmTypeVersionId as algorithmImplementation_algorithmTypeVersionId , algorithmImplementation1.executorTypeId as algorithmImplementation_executorTypeId , algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationName as algorithmImplementation_algorithmImplementationName , algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationClass as algorithmImplementation_algorithmImplementationClass , algorithmScheduleType1.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmScheduleType_algorithmScheduleTypeId , algorithmScheduleType1.guid as algorithmScheduleType_guid , algorithmScheduleType1.algorithmScheduleTypeName as algorithmScheduleType_algorithmScheduleTypeName , algorithmScheduleType1.insertedRowDate as algorithmScheduleType_insertedRowDate , algorithmScheduleType1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmScheduleType_lastUpdatedDate from algorithmSchedule algorithmSchedule1 join algorithmImplementation algorithmImplementation1 on algorithmSchedule1.algorithmImplementationId = algorithmImplementation1.algorithmImplementationId join algorithmScheduleType algorithmScheduleType1 on algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleTypeId = algorithmScheduleType1.algorithmScheduleTypeId;

select algorithmScheduleColumn1.algorithmScheduleColumnId, algorithmScheduleColumn1.guid, algorithmScheduleColumn1.algorithmScheduleId, algorithmScheduleColumn1.algorithmColumnTypeId, algorithmScheduleColumn1.algorithmScheduleViewId, algorithmScheduleColumn1.sourceViewId, algorithmScheduleColumn1.sourceViewColumnId, algorithmScheduleColumn1.extendedProperties, algorithmScheduleColumn1.insertedRowDate, algorithmScheduleColumn1.lastUpdatedDate , algorithmColumnType1.algorithmColumnTypeId as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeId , algorithmColumnType1.algorithmColumnTypeName as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeName , algorithmColumnType1.algorithmColumnTypeDescription as algorithmColumnType_algorithmColumnTypeDescription , algorithmColumnType1.insertedRowDate as algorithmColumnType_insertedRowDate , algorithmColumnType1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmColumnType_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmColumnType1.guid as algorithmColumnType_guid , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleId , algorithmSchedule1.guid as algorithmSchedule_guid , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmImplementationId , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleTypeId , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleName as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleName , algorithmSchedule1.isScheduled as algorithmSchedule_isScheduled , algorithmSchedule1.insertedRowDate as algorithmSchedule_insertedRowDate , algorithmSchedule1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmSchedule_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmScheduleView1.algorithmScheduleViewId as algorithmScheduleView_algorithmScheduleViewId , algorithmScheduleView1.guid as algorithmScheduleView_guid , algorithmScheduleView1.algorithmScheduleViewTypeId as algorithmScheduleView_algorithmScheduleViewTypeId , algorithmScheduleView1.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmScheduleView_algorithmScheduleId , algorithmScheduleView1.sourceViewId as algorithmScheduleView_sourceViewId , algorithmScheduleView1.insertedRowDate as algorithmScheduleView_insertedRowDate , algorithmScheduleView1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmScheduleView_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmScheduleView1.joinOnDefinition as algorithmScheduleView_joinOnDefinition , sourceView1.sourceViewId as sourceView_sourceViewId , sourceView1.guid as sourceView_guid , sourceView1.sourceInstanceId as sourceView_sourceInstanceId , sourceView1.sourceViewTypeId as sourceView_sourceViewTypeId , sourceView1.sourceViewName as sourceView_sourceViewName , sourceView1.sourceViewDefinition as sourceView_sourceViewDefinition , sourceView1.insertedRowDate as sourceView_insertedRowDate , sourceView1.lastUpdatedDate as sourceView_lastUpdatedDate , sourceViewColumn1.sourceViewColumnId as sourceViewColumn_sourceViewColumnId , sourceViewColumn1.sourceViewId as sourceViewColumn_sourceViewId , sourceViewColumn1.insertedRowDate as sourceViewColumn_insertedRowDate , sourceViewColumn1.lastUpdatedDate as sourceViewColumn_lastUpdatedDate , sourceViewColumn1.guid as sourceViewColumn_guid , sourceViewColumn1.columnName as sourceViewColumn_columnName , sourceViewColumn1.columnType as sourceViewColumn_columnType from algorithmScheduleColumn algorithmScheduleColumn1 join algorithmColumnType algorithmColumnType1 on algorithmScheduleColumn1.algorithmColumnTypeId = algorithmColumnType1.algorithmColumnTypeId join algorithmSchedule algorithmSchedule1 on algorithmScheduleColumn1.algorithmScheduleId = algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleId join algorithmScheduleView algorithmScheduleView1 on algorithmScheduleColumn1.algorithmScheduleViewId = algorithmScheduleView1.algorithmScheduleViewId join sourceView sourceView1 on algorithmScheduleColumn1.sourceViewId = sourceView1.sourceViewId join sourceViewColumn sourceViewColumn1 on algorithmScheduleColumn1.sourceViewColumnId = sourceViewColumn1.sourceViewColumnId;

select algorithmScheduleParam1.algorithmScheduleParamId, algorithmScheduleParam1.guid, algorithmScheduleParam1.algorithmScheduleId, algorithmScheduleParam1.algorithmParamId, algorithmScheduleParam1.algorithmParamValue, algorithmScheduleParam1.insertedRowDate, algorithmScheduleParam1.lastUpdatedDate , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamId as algorithmParam_algorithmParamId , algorithmParam1.guid as algorithmParam_guid , algorithmParam1.insertedRowDate as algorithmParam_insertedRowDate , algorithmParam1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmParam_lastUpdatedDate , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamName as algorithmParam_algorithmParamName , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamDescription as algorithmParam_algorithmParamDescription , algorithmParam1.algorithmParamType as algorithmParam_algorithmParamType , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleId , algorithmSchedule1.guid as algorithmSchedule_guid , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmImplementationId , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleTypeId , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleName as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleName , algorithmSchedule1.isScheduled as algorithmSchedule_isScheduled , algorithmSchedule1.insertedRowDate as algorithmSchedule_insertedRowDate , algorithmSchedule1.lastUpdatedDate as algorithmSchedule_lastUpdatedDate from algorithmScheduleParam algorithmScheduleParam1 join algorithmParam algorithmParam1 on algorithmScheduleParam1.algorithmParamId = algorithmParam1.algorithmParamId join algorithmSchedule algorithmSchedule1 on algorithmScheduleParam1.algorithmScheduleId = algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleId;

select algorithmScheduleView1.algorithmScheduleViewId, algorithmScheduleView1.guid, algorithmScheduleView1.algorithmScheduleViewTypeId, algorithmScheduleView1.algorithmScheduleId, algorithmScheduleView1.sourceViewId, algorithmScheduleView1.insertedRowDate, algorithmScheduleView1.lastUpdatedDate, algorithmScheduleView1.joinOnDefinition , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleId , algorithmSchedule1.guid as algorithmSchedule_guid , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmImplementationId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmImplementationId , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleTypeId as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleTypeId , algorithmSchedule1.algorithmScheduleName as algorithmSchedule_algorithmScheduleName ,
